description: This file manages authentication state using Zustand, providing functions for login, registration, token refresh, and logout, with token persistence and decoding.

methods.name: safeDecode(token)
methods.description: Decodes a JWT token and extracts user information, returning null if decoding fails.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Calls API to authenticate user, saves token and user info to state.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Calls API to register new user, saves token and user info to state.

methods.name: refreshMe
methods.description: Refreshes user info from API and updates state.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears token and user info from state.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restores user info from token if available.
